title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Game 5 of the the NBA finals with TNT’s Chris Haynes. Having been at the game, Chris shares his takeaways and who he’d award the MVP to. And DP discusses Phil Mickelson’s press conference at the US Open.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
